document_data.name: Erakic
document_data.mainbody: '''Erakic''' was a language spoken by the [[Eraka]], the barbarians of [[The Ride]], from [[Frozen Forest]] in the north to the [[Dragonspine Mountains]] in the south, and from [[Desert's Edge]] in the west to the [[Galena Mountains]] in the east.<ref name=D:SiT-p26>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}} It was one of the [[Low Ulutim languages]].<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
